section.title: Installing MySQL
section.para: During the install, you'll be prompted for the mysql root password. Enter a password of your choice and verify it.
Use sed to edit /etc/mysql/my.cnf to change bind-address from localhost (127.0.0.1) to any (0.0.0.0) and restart the mysql service, as root.
Set MySQL to start the daemon every time you start and then start the server. # chkconfig --level 2345 mysqld on # service mysqld start
